text: I am migrating a client from WordPress, they have approx 50 pages which are noindexed. With WP its very easy for any of their staff to mark a page as noindex, and also see which pages it applies too. The HubSpot ways seems.. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/prevent-content-from-appearing-in-search-results|a little more primitive>! Are there any better solutions?

I was thinking about a noindex module that a user could just drag in to the page and it would add the noindex meta tag to the header. Of course they would also need to manually remove the page from the sitemap.... :thinking_face:
